comments:
Build ID: Build id: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
Build ID: Build id: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Start UpdateManager
2. Select PDE Plugin from the Europa Discovery Site and accept the license
3. When the Feature verification ialog pops up select "Install " and there you are :-(



More information:
More information:
the following entry can be found in the log:
